```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
us_rent_income |> 
  filter(variable == "income") |> 
  arrange(desc(estimate)) |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  select(name, estimate) |> 
  slice(1:10) |> 
  gt() |> 
  tab_header("Top 10 US incomes")
```
